abilities.name: Energy Recycle
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may use this power. If you do, your turn ends. Search your discard pile for up to 3 Energy cards and attach them to your Pokémon in any way you like. This power can't be used if Electivire FB is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Powerful Spark
attacks.effect: Does 30 damage plus 10 more damage for each Energy attached to all of your Pokémon.
